hero.name: UT
hero.headline: High-energy club music with a silly grin and a serious bounce.
hero.subheadline: Fast, bouncy, euphoric sets between hard groove, trance flavours, hard dance pressure, donk, and 240-leaning chaos — built for the room, never on autopilot.
hero.genres: Hard Bounce (240 KMH) · Hard Techno · Hard Dance · Trance · Hard Groove · Donk · Tribal / Makina · Melodic Techno

artist.title: Raised in India, shaping Dublin's dancefloors
artist.bio:
I'm UT — a Dublin-based DJ who grew up in India and brings that energy to every set. I treat each performance like a conversation with the crowd. My sound lives in the sweet spot where punchy grooves meet euphoric melodies: hard bounce and hard dance pressure, trancey peaks, and playful curveballs when the room's ready.

I'm not here to maintain a vibe. I'm here to move it — fast mixes, cheeky switches, and momentum that keeps climbing. Whether it's a packed club night, a rooftop session, or a festival stage, the goal is the same: shared release.
highlights: Typical tempo: 155–180 BPM (higher when it makes sense)
Styles: hard bounce, hard techno, hard dance, trance, hard groove, donk, tribal/makina, melodic techno

gigs.description: Closing set at Redline's biggest event with 300+ attendees. High-energy 240 km/h sound.

First gig of 2025 at Soundhouse's Immersive event.

pressKit.title: Press Kit
pressKit.description: Download materials for promoters, press, and media
pressKit.bio_short: UT is a Dublin-based DJ delivering high-energy club sets between hard bounce, hard dance, and trance. Fast, bouncy, euphoric — built for the room, never on autopilot.
pressKit.bio_long:
UT is a Dublin-based DJ who treats every set like a conversation with the crowd. His sound lives in the sweet spot where punchy grooves meet euphoric melodies: hard bounce and hard dance pressure, trancey peaks, and playful curveballs when the room's ready.

With a typical tempo range of 155–180 BPM (going higher when it makes sense), UT delivers sets that are high-energy, cheeky, and crowd-led. Whether it's a packed club night, a rooftop session, or a festival stage, the goal is the same: shared release.

UT has performed at major Dublin venues including Racket Space, Soundhouse, The Grand Social, and Hyde Rooftop, as well as festival stages like Electric Picnic. He's a core member of the Redline collective and has played with Immersive, Politeknik, Ravemate, and more.
